title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews and market research to understand user needs and preferences.

title: System Architecture Design for MentorSkillMarketplace
description:
Design the overall system architecture including functional and non-functional requirements, components, data flow diagrams, integration points, scalability considerations, performance optimization strategies. This design should take into account user experience, security, accessibility considerations, and ensure modularity for easy maintenance and future enhancements. The design will be based on a microservices architecture with RESTful APIs, following best practices in software development (e.g., SOLID principles, clean architecture).

To improve the clarity of the document, sections have been added for specific areas such as authentication, data storage, and frontend/backend technology stacks. The design also outlines the testing strategy for each microservice, provides a plan for handling potential future enhancements or new feature requests.

**Note:** Please review the following sections:
1. Authentication: [Provide detailed explanation of authentication system] 
2. Data Storage: [Explain data storage solutions and considerations] 
3. Frontend/Backend Technology Stacks: [Detailed breakdown of frontend and backend tech stack choices, including reasons for these choices]
4. Security Considerations: [Detail security measures taken, including encryption methods, user data protection, and potential vulnerabilities]
5. Performance Optimization Strategies: [Provide strategies to ensure optimal performance] 
6. Testing Strategy: [Detailed testing strategy for each microservice] 
7. Future Enhancements/New Feature Requests Plan: [Outline a plan for handling future enhancements or new feature requests]

Once these sections have been reviewed and updated, please provide comments in the 'review_comments' field.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema to store mentor profiles, skills, and mentee information.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for mentors to create profiles, showcase skills, and for mentees to search and connect with mentors.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the server-side logic, including authentication, profile management, search functionality, and mentor-mentee matching.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement robust security measures including authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms. Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices for handling sensitive user data and financial transactions. Additional considerations include the use of encryption, secure communication protocols, periodic vulnerability assessments, regular penetration testing, and a system for secure storage and transmission of sensitive data (e.g., two-factor authentication). Collaborate with the Security-Specialist and DevOps-Engineer team members for implementation, consult with the Frontend-Developer and Backend-Developer teams for integration into the user interface and API respectively. Document security measures in the technical design specifications for future reference, also include a plan for regular updates to keep up with evolving threats and security standards. Ensure that the task is decomposed further if necessary for efficient execution.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, integration, and performance testing. Ensure high code quality and user experience.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the application.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users.
